dcterms:creator: M.J. Domínguez Vázquez
C. Valcárcel Riveiro
dcterms:description: Portlex is a semi-collaborative, multilingual, cross-lingual dictionary for German, Spanish, French, Italian, and Galician, serving as a basis for the development of automatic language generators Xera and Combinatoria.
dcterms:title: Portlex

dcterms:creator: M.J. Domínguez Vázquez
dcterms:description: German Web 2013 (de TenTen13) is a corpus used for frequency analysis and syntactic-semantic argument structure generation.
dcterms:title: German Web 2013 (de TenTen13)

dcterms:description: Sketch Engine is a corpus management and analysis tool that provides access to various corpora for linguistic research.
dcterms:title: Sketch Engine

dcterms:creator: X. Gómez Guinovart
M.A. Solla Portela
dcterms:description: WordNet is a lexical database that provides semantic relationships between words, used for semantic analysis and natural language processing.
dcterms:title: WordNet

dcterms:creator: M.J. Domínguez Vázquez
C. Valcárcel Riveiro
D. Bardanca Outeiriño
N. Catalá Torres
N. López Iglesias
R. Martín Gascueña
M. Mirazo Balsa
M.T. Sanmarco Bande
L. Pino Serrano
dcterms:description: Combinatoria is an online prototype for the bi-argumental generation of nominal phrases in German, Spanish, and French.
dcterms:title: Combinatoria

dcterms:creator: M.J. Domínguez Vázquez
C. Valcárcel Riveiro
D. Bardanca Outeiriño
J.A. Calañas Continente
N. Catalá Torres
R. Martín Gascueña
M. Mirazo Balsa
M.T. Sanmarco Bande
L. Pino Serrano
dcterms:description: Xera is an online prototype for the automatic mono-argumental generation of nominal phrases in German, Spanish, and French.
dcterms:title: Xera
